comment.body:
I don't know if they currently do an A/B testing regarding the delivery method & co, but I can't reproduce that in my usual Firefox profile while … I always can in a fresh one (reproducible even with just **Base**, **Tracking Protection** and **Dutch** filters enabled).

##### :bulb: In this case, the second rule from [here](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/16881#issuecomment-1439181520) is indeed also required to allow the video to play:

```adblock
@@||doubleclick.net^$xmlhttprequest,domain=goplay.be
```

###### … but then, you have video ads — and the `xml-prune` solution given in the above link doesn't work for me (even in the AG format).

#### :arrow_right: Need more analysis, so I'll let the team dig deeper for this case. :eyes: #DAI

comment.body: You also verify your age there, so we do not block such windows.

Привет @ameshkov, не подскажешь, баг ли это?

В листе Easylist есть правило `@@||dropbox.com^$generichide`, которое @Alex-302 отключил правилом `@@||dropbox.com^$generichide,badfilter`, но вот только после этого пропадает возможность пользоваться расширением Adguard Assistant, которое я использую в связке с Adguard for Windows в браузере (я использую Firefox v110.0.1 x64-86), а именно, через дашпанель я не могу для сайта `https://www.dropbox.com` отключить фильтрацию, пишет что "Фильтрация отключена, так как может нарушить работу сайта".

Разве так работает флаг `badfilter`?

Ссылка для проверки `https://www.dropbox.com/s/72evbmx6768tcuj/stick.jpg`

PS: вообще это происходит не только для сайта `https://www.dropbox.com`, можешь проверить и на `https://google`, только создай два подобных правила.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Дело не просто в badfilter, просто в сложной конфигурации правил помощник
не может понять какое правило добавлять чтобы включить/выключить защиту.

On Mon, 13 Mar 2023 at 08:39, bogachenko ***@***.***> wrote:

> Привет @ameshkov <https://github.com/ameshkov>, не подскажешь, баг ли это?
>
> В листе Easylist есть правило @@||dropbox.com^$generichide, которое
> @Alex-302 <https://github.com/Alex-302> отключил правилом @@||dropbox.com
> ^$generichide,badfilter, но вот только после этого пропадает возможность
> пользоваться расширением Adguard Assistant, которое я использую в связке с
> Adguard for Windows в браузере (я использую Firefox v110.0.1 x64-86), а
> именно, через дашпанель я не могу для сайта https://www.dropbox.com
> отключить фильтрацию, пишет что "Фильтрация отключена, так как может
> нарушить работу сайта".
>
> Разве так работает флаг badfilter?
>
> Ссылка для проверки https://www.dropbox.com/s/72evbmx6768tcuj/stick.jpg
>
> PS: вообще это происходит не только для сайта https://www.dropbox.com,
> можешь проверить и на https://google, только создай два подобных правила.
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/558d0b8f9610011b3947bdb85a35be2d992bbc44#r104174972>,

> .

comment.body:
@Alex-302 I think it's okay to generically block
```
/asset/angular.min.js?t=$xmlhttprequest,~third-party
/asset/jquery/slim-3.2.min.js?*&t=$xmlhttprequest,~third-party
```
Legit sites won't use xmlhttprequest for such resources.

comment.body:
Здравствуйте
Не повторилось.
Проверьте, включена ли защита и определяется ли AdGuard на тестовой странице
https://adguard.com/ru/test.html

Ещё попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Yandex Browser

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://translate.yandex.ru/

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. При блокировке рекламы на сайте, блок рекламы исчезает, но структура сайта нарушается. Основные фреймы не по центру и аватарка сдвинута вправо.

> У меня не повторяется

Она показывается в Яндекс Браузере и не показывается, например, в Edge.
У вас не показывается реклама даже если вы залогинены, как я вижу.

You can view the data stored in your account and manage your search history. Log in./Keeps you logged out." >  It cannot always be reproduced by searching for the same word. Therefore, I don't think you can reproduce it by accessing the URL of the issue. The only way to reproduce it is to repeat the word search until the image popup appears. >  I uploaded the html file for you to utilize. Thank you in advance. > > https://openload.cc/l5McZ5c6z7/_Google_2023_3_9_7_50_55_html ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue is caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, please add to your user rules: 
`cell.com#@#.article-tools__wrapper, .js--sticky.clearfix.content-navigation
`
Hello @yourduskquibbles, please take a look

comment.body:
Great! I see you even replaced `<=150` with `<=10` (like for TF1), as I was planning to say to do for production after this broader test, if it was successful. So it's perfect! Thank you very much! :v:

:bulb: I suspected this countermeasure (TF1 uses it and I mentioned this point at the time), because it was predictable.

###### :arrow_right_hook: So, as said above, that's already the second candidate for me for a potential future trusted scriptlet allowing us to set JSON value. Although, at first anyway, it will remain compatible with AdGuard products only. But it will be cleaner and easier to create anyway. :thumbsup:

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

NA

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I don't remove a rule of `||a.com^` when EL has `||a.com^$third-party` as advised, but I think whether these rules are really needed should be checked. Here the list of such rules:
```
! firstparty
||ads.linkedin.com^
! adservers
||histock.info^
||admanmedia.com^
||adsrv4k.com^
||fireworkadservices1.com^
||getmyfreetraffic.com^
||paibopse.com^
||reevaipi.com^
||sendmepush.com^
||profield.ddns.net^
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Many websites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

In Google search result with a Korean language query, there are some spam websites that its domain is changed frequently.


It seems that importing the following rules is best idea.

```adblock
/^https:\/\/[A-z0-9\.]*[A-z0-9]+\.[A-z]+\/\?u=[A-z0-9]{7}&o=[A-z0-9]{7}/$document
/^https:\/\/[A-z]+\.[A-z]+\.[A-z]+\/[A-z]+-robot\/\?pl=[A-z0-9-]{22}&sm=[A-z]+-robot&hash=[A-z0-9-]{22}&exp=[0-9]{10}/$document
/^https:\/\/[0-9]{9}\.[A-z0-9-]+\.[A-z]{2}\/[0-9]{6}\.html$/$document
```

Related issues:
 - https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/598
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/139667

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

Many websites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

In Google search result with a Korean language query, there are some spam websites that its domain is changed frequently.


It seems that importing the following rules is best idea.

```adblock
/^https:\/\/[A-z0-9\.]*[A-z0-9]+\.[A-z]+\/\?u=[A-z0-9]{7}&o=[A-z0-9]{7}/$document
/^https:\/\/[A-z]+\.[A-z]+\.[A-z]+\/[A-z]+-robot\/\?pl=[A-z0-9-]{22}&sm=[A-z]+-robot&hash=[A-z0-9-]{22}&exp=[0-9]{10}/$document
/^https:\/\/[0-9]{9}\.[A-z0-9-]+\.[A-z]{2}\/[0-9]{6}\.html$/$document
```

Related issues:
 - https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/598
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/139667

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Threema Web and App (all messengers)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Since an update from Adguard, Threema Web or the app no longer runs on a Windows computer. Even if I deactivate Adguard. I have to take the DNS in the Fritzbox away from Adguard, delete the DNS cache on the Windows machine and restart. Then Threema gets a connection again.

### Proposed solution

I have not yet been able to narrow down the problem.
In general, I would find it helpful if messengers were excluded from Adguard when filtering.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
Hi @Alex-302,

After slightly more thorough tests, I clearly found a pattern (tested 4 if not 5 times for reproducibility, in private window of a brand new fresh and clean profile with unlogging, closing the latter and starting again each time).

### Could you try to reproduce this on your side?
###### (STR, to recreate the problem of @Yiha777 > Accepting the cookies)

<details>
<summary>Reveal …</summary>

###### Ideally, in a private browsing window.
1. [Enable](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224792823-fadef92c-2825-4c29-b03b-04ff66218b8c.png) only **Base**, **Tracking Protection** and **Dutch** filters.
2. Go to this [link](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goplay.be%2Fvideo%2Frecht-naar-de-gevangenis%2Frecht-naar-de-gevangenis-s1%2Frecht-naar-de-gevangenis-s1-aflevering-1%23autoplay). Or better, @Yiha777's [one](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.goplay.be%2Fvideo%2Ftulpen-uit-antwerpen%2Ftulpen-uit-antwerpen%2Ftulpen-uit-antwerpen-s1-aflevering-5%23autoplay).
###### :arrow_right_hook: **EDIT:** I just saw now in the writing of this post that all my tests were based on the wrong link (the one in the first post), different from the one from @Yiha777. BUT, anyway, I was able to replicate that with its link as well.
3. Either click on the [green button](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224795107-edde3cbb-24c8-47af-bb9b-882557ef8e5c.jpg) `Verder naar GoPlay` (Continue to GoPlay) or `Meer informatie →` then the [green button](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224795129-ec7bfa91-02ee-4e21-bdd3-3312fcff65cb.png) `Alles akkoord` (Agree all).
4. Observe the [error](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224795393-13713e47-8c8d-4b16-8069-62a6c258d578.png) in question appearing: `Something went wrong while setting up a Google DAI stream.` :heavy_multiplication_x:
</details>

### And this one now?
###### (STR, to avoid this problem > Refusing the cookies)

<details>
<summary>Reveal …</summary>

###### Ideally, in a private browsing window too, after unlogging and closing it before.
1+2. Same as previous STR (choice of filters and link to click).
3. Click on `Meer informatie →` then the [gray button](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224795129-ec7bfa91-02ee-4e21-bdd3-3312fcff65cb.png) `Niets akkoord` (Disagree).
4. Observe that all is OK, the video [starts playing](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224797459-843626a3-bd0a-4b7a-9a31-d61b6a133657.jpg) (ad-free and without error). :heavy_check_mark:
</details>

###### :bulb: Luckily, I note as an additional test that when the _AdGuard Annoyances filter_ is used, [cookies are auto-refused](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224803363-fb43fce7-7269-46cc-bc55-03e34bb19614.jpg) thanks to [that rule](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/264fce47cc3c3a46d4c187f509d452ccde71365e/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections/cookies_specific.txt#L9861) and therefore the error does not appear in this case (a lot of people are therefore spared :relaxed:).

comment.body:
Исключение - это разблокирующее правило фильтрации.
Кликнув на желтую или красную строку можно создать правило, которое разблокирует элемент страницы или запрос.

<details>
<summary>1</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/224808607-ba1109ba-5500-465f-923b-c5df7d4e7cc3.png)


</details>

<details>
<summary>2</summary>
